title: Mobile Game-Based Educational Program for Improving Adolescent Sleep Hygiene

context.additional_context: Practical sleep management education tailored for job-seeking individuals.

learning_goals: Analyze sleep pattern data within 7 days to improve sleep efficiency by over 15%.
Establish and share a sleep hygiene practice plan at least three times weekly through cooperative-competitive game activities.
Learners can write sleep improvement project reports while receiving peer feedback in a socially interactive environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
